heading: Content Block 4

heading: Content Block 5
summary: Guidance on access to the labor marketThis guide is intended for migrants and temporary protected persons who want to access the labor market in Romania. It offers a thorough introduction to the Romanian employment system, providing important resources as well as an understanding of the legal aspects for finding a job. The guide was created as part of the project "CDMiR 4 Ukraine: Raising awareness of human rights and equal treatment of Ukrainian refugees in Romania."View guide
